Player History
Drafted in 8th round, 87th overall pick, by Houston in 2019...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2019, off Harold Buehler (WAS)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/2/2019, off Louis Knight (WAS)...
Drove in 6 runs against Baltimore on 6/13/2019...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/19/2019, hitting .435 with 4 HR, 13 RBI...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Won Conference Championship with Houston in 2020...
Signed as a free agent by Washington on 3/1/2021 to a 1-year deal worth $3,120,000 per year...
